reuters.title: U.S. SELLING 12.8 BILLION DLRS OF 3 AND 6-MO BILLS MARCH 30 TO PAY DOWN 1.2 BILLION DLRS
reuters.body: Shr loss seven cts vs profit five cts Net loss 149,421 vs profit 103,120 Sales 1,698,345 vs 1,920,010 Six Mths Shr loss five cts vs profit nine cts Net loss 100,472 vs profit 191,614 Sales 3,836,794 vs 3,650,322 Reuter 
